org.apache.cxf.ws.security.wss4j.policyvalidators
Interface TokenPolicyValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
SamlTokenPolicyValidator, SecurityContextTokenPolicyValidator, UsernameTokenPolicyValidator, WSS11PolicyValidator, X509TokenPolicyValidator
public interface TokenPolicyValidator

Validate a WS-SecurityPolicy corresponding to a received token.
